VIII.iii.10.1.a
.
Presumption of SC for COVID-19
Effective January 5, 2021,
38 U.S.C. 1164
established the presumption of service connection (SC) for Coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
Reference
:Â  For more information on the establishment of the presumption of SC for COVID-19, see
Public Law (PL) 116-315, Section 4101
, the
Johnny Isakson and David P. Roe, M.D. Veterans Health Care and Benefits Improvement Act of 2020
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
